title: Will the artist I see in the videos be the same one performing?
content: Yes, the lead artist will be same as per the videos and photos shown in the profile.

title: Can I select the songs/scripts from your set list?
content: Yes, you can pick & request the songs/scripts. We will try to play as much as possible.

title: How much time is needed for set up?
content: Ideally we like to have at least 60 minutes to set up and we like to perform for near about 120-150 minutes.

title: Is all equipment, including PA and lighting, included in your quote?
content: All Live101 bookings come with standard inclusions of Artist Fees and travel charges. All booking will clearly mention about all inclusions and exclusions.

title: Which venues have you previously performed at?
content: We have played many venues up and down the country. Starting from caf√©'s to 5 star hotels, we've played them all.

title: Do you offer different line-up options?
content: Yes. We vary from a solo artist to a full band. We are able to add members as per your requirement.
